attributes.action: Scrap the BBC license fee or give the option of owning a television without the BBC channels.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If you are sick paying for the BBC license fee, feel it offers little by way of quality or value for money, and would like to see it scrapped or have the option to watch television without a license and without the BBC channels sign this petition to the government here.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
